item.description:
The topic of this session is using creativity for successfully standing out with your heart-based business. We'll talk about how you can use creative approaches in marketing without being gimmicky.

The Marketing Cafe™ is the online radio show that features simple, yet highly effective ideas for solopreneurs and small business owners like you who want to make a good living while making a difference in the world.

Get Show Access Info here: http://authenticbusinessgrowth.com/creativity-factor/

Date: Thursday, Sept. 20, 2012

Time: 12 noon Eastern Time
(Replay available if your schedule doesn't cooperate).

The featured guest for this show is Katie Curtin, creativity and money coach, and host of the Creativity Cafe.

Your host is marketing results coach Mark Reinert, founder of Authentic Business Growth, LLC and the creator of the Business Growth Dojo™ the definitive business incubator for independent professionals and owners of small service-based businesses.

Get Show Access Info here: http://authenticbusinessgrowth.com/creativity-factor/

During this show you will learn:

* The importance of creativity in creating a successful business or service.
* 3 strategies for finding your unique way of standing out from the crowd.
* Getting past the controversy between creative expression and the cookie cutter approaches taught by many marketing coaches and programs. (When you understand this, the frustration and controversy will melt away.)
* 3 foundational principles that act as safeguards to help you steer clear of being gimmicky.
* Several examples of creative marketing strategies.
* The role of beauty in marketing materials

Get Show Access Info here: http://authenticbusinessgrowth.com/creativity-factor/
item.name: The Creativity Factor for Successful Promotion
